Header: Police to set up Election Operation Bureaus for upcoming elections
Content: Police Headquarters say that steps have been taken to set up a police election operations bureau in each police division in view of the upcoming elections. Police MediaÂ Spokesperson ASP Ruwan Gunasekara stated the unit will operate under the supervision of a Superintendent of Police or an Assistant Superintendent of Police. He added that an election operations unit has been set up in each police station.
